title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, November 11, 2021
description: Today is the birthday of Kurt Vonnegut (1922), author of many books including “Slaughterhouse-Five,” “Jailbird,” and “Welcome to the Monkey House.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of Kurt Vonnegut (1922), author of many books including “Slaughterhouse-Five,” “Jailbird,” and “Welcome to the Monkey House.”
